website_summaries.verdict: Premium hunting slingshot that's expertly crafted for optimal performance.
pros: Metal alloy body gives slingshot a textured look and feel
Magnets on support strap enable you to keep steel ball bearings close at hand
Frosted paint finish improves friction between slingshot and palm
Comes with flashlight holder and carrying case

customer_reviews.title: the slingshot itself is great except the flashlight holder is poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: the slingshot itself is great except the flashlight holder is poorly designed ... the fastening screw doesn't allow for the wrist brace articulation or I am just not getting it, can't fold it when it's attached and it's a very tight fit....and there is no manual even though it's pretty straight forward that might prove helpful....mostly quality with minor deductions...a screw was missing. I guess I won't be hunting vampires with this because of the flashlight....
customer_reviews.author: Avatarzan

customer_reviews.title: Way too stiff.
customer_reviews.text: Waaaay stiffer than i had anticipated. Draw is far too short and they lack the velocity i was hoping for. Bought them as a replacement (obviously) for the ones that came with my rocket. Perhaps they will loosen with some time but i am willing to bet they snap first. If by some chance miracle they do limber up and perform better ill change my rating but for now this is it. Not good for varmint hunting whatsoever. Possibly ok for target shooting if you only ise a half-pull method.
customer_reviews.author: JMH

customer_reviews.title: Solidly made, but hard to use
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to pull back due to the six band design. Nice and solid, and I appreciated the spares and the way you can remove the wrist brace.
customer_reviews.author: hh

customer_reviews.title: More farther
customer_reviews.text: This is the third type of triple bands ive bought and surely the most powerfull. The length is on the short side but that increases power. The pouch is on the small size but that also increases velocity. There were some raised spots on the leather but it was fine when i planed it down with a knife. I estimate just under 300 fps with theese.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slingshot is good, but loses 2 stars for the crappy, broken case.
customer_reviews.text: The slingshot itself is fine. Looks well made. However, the product packaging is horrendous. It had a big sticker that was slapped sloppily over another sticker (which I assume is the original manufacturer in China), and the black case was broken and cracked on 2 sides (2 big holes). Who sells a brand new product in a case like this? For such a nice slingshot I was hoping to get a nice case with it, but now I have to find something else to carry this in because this case is unacceptable. I ordered the black version by the way.
customer_reviews.author: K. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed!! The bands break way too easily and when you replace them, they won't last but maybe 2 times.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: It’s OK
customer_reviews.text: The slingshot is OK, but the rubber seems to deteriorate very fast don’t last very long, it would be nice when the handle opens up for the wrist part of it would lock in somehow but it doesn’t so it flops around a lot when you’re trying to pick it up in a hurry to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Frigerio

customer_reviews.title: Great bands
customer_reviews.text: Great band plenty of power, although the texture of the leather makes me cringe
customer_reviews.author: Mark R.

customer_reviews.title: rubber bands or tubes breaking at less than 40 shots, great frame
customer_reviews.text: Rubber bands started to break at 40 shots or less, contacted morefarther about this and they offered to send me a replacement, great service and very professional as customer service

customer_reviews.title: Week rubbers
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful slingshot gave it as a present to my 7yr nephew and one of the rubbers ripped with in a week so that was very disappointing. I have a similar version which was cheaper and ive had it for 5 months and its still working great and rubbers are strong i haven't had to replace any.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Sturdy, shoots far. Only wish it had a sighting system... but, works awesome and love that it comes with backup bungees.
customer_reviews.author: Customer #0001

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Given a gift 🎁. Receveived with excitement. Not tested, but fit well and visually inspected, meeting expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Bean Me Up

customer_reviews.title: It's a sling shot
customer_reviews.text: Seller is fantastic! If anything isn't up to par with your order he will contact you and make it right. Slingshot fires great and works very well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Olaf Fedko

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and also comes with accessories and extra rubber straps.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Lara Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good for Kids
customer_reviews.text: I used the 4 rubber band option, (2 on each side), for my grand-kids aged 6-10 yrs. They can pull it and work it pretty well. I am happy with its accuracy for my own use.
customer_reviews.author: Dugger

customer_reviews.title: Still working good after a month of heavy trainings
customer_reviews.text: Way better than original ones I've got with slingshot itself.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: The product is shorter than the one came with the ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is shorter than the one came with the slingshot. Gave five star because the length didn't really matter.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Good kid's toy
customer_reviews.text: Great for a kid. Wouldn't buy it for an adult
customer_reviews.author: Crystalwolf

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my husband as a father’s day gift. He hasn’t put it down. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Olya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, go for teenage son for Christmas, he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Rhoton

customer_reviews.title: grrr.....band broke after only a few shots
customer_reviews.text: Both bands broke within days of install...one band had maybe a dozen shots thru it when it gave way. These are NOT of hunting power band, more of target type. Giving it 2 stars because at least the leather pouches are nice and sturdy. Sadly, I cant say Id recommend.
customer_reviews.author: FranklySpeaking

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They should work they're extra so hopefully won't need them for awhile
customer_reviews.author: werkerss

product_meta.title: MoreFarther Professional Slingshot Wrist Sling Rocket Outdoor Hunting Sling Shot High Velocity Catapult with 2 Rubber Bands and 200 Steel Ammos
feature_bullets: [POWERFUL AND HIGH VELOCITY]: MoreFarther professional slingshot set, made by 6 rubber bands, more power, accurate and high velocity, best slingshots for hunting

[PROFESSIONAL DESIGN]: Y Shot Slingshot, the design makes the ejection base more stable. Wrist Rocket Slingshot, steady handle and wrist support frame play a greater ejection intensity. Ergonomic design, made the grip handle is more comfortable and easy to use.

[REMOVABLE FLASHLINGHT MOUNT]: Removable flashlight mount include you can install it according to your usage habits, with it you can use with flashlight very easy to find the targets in the night. Quickly and accurately hit the target. (FLASHLIGHT NOT INCLUDE)

[VERSATILE SLINGSHOTS]: Foldable slingshot convenient to carry best outdoors hunting slingshots catapult. Great for eye and attention training, entertainment, outdoor competition, fitness catapult and hunting, also for boutique collection
[PACKAGE INCLUDE]: Pack of 1x professional slingshot，2x rubber bands, 200x steel slingshot ammos, and screw key, easily to assemble according to your usage habits
